title: A more teambased meta.
body:
Would you like the game to move to a more team based meta. 
Where it is almost impossible for one man to carry. 
This may start to drive laners to play differently and build more items more appropriate to their team comp. 
Surely, this is better than the league of oneshots and the constant 1 and 2nd wave fights that laners have hoping to get fed harder than their teammate can int. 

What do you think about this?

replies.body: are you trying to make trolls even stronger lol, that's like chaining a troll onto your waist and giving you no chance of being a self securer or carry when there's so many fake troll accounts or stubborn new players out there tilting, it'd be nice for a new game mode probably but not meta, not enough people even bother to learn or mix their items accordingly due to hugging metas

Trolls are easy to deal with. In this meta, trolls are dealt with hard with 2 weeks bans and not given a slap on the wrist or nothing at all like they do now. League is a team based game and needs to start being played like one. 

Your new gamemode idea sounds good.
